text: The Towson Tigers women's lacrosse team is an NCAA Division I college lacrosse team representing Towson University as part of the Colonial Athletic Association. They play their home games at Johnny Unitas Stadium in Towson, Maryland. ==Individual career records== Reference: {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="width:140px; "|Record ! style="width:35px; "|Amount ! style="width:140px; "|Player ! style="width:70px; "|Years |- style="text- align:center;" | Goals || 208 || Ruth Gutridge || 1983-86 |- style="text- align:center;" | Assists || 91 || Ashley Rohrback || 2010-14 |- style="text- align:center;" | Points || 267 || Ruth Gutridge || 1983-86 |- style="text- align:center;" | Ground balls || 181 || Melissa Garner || 2000-03 |- style="text-align:center;" | Draw controls || 327 || Hillary Fratzke || 2006-10 |- style="text-align:center;" | Caused turnovers || 144 || Hillary Fratzke || 2006-10 |- style="text-align:center;" | Saves || 912 || Jacquie Sica || 1997-00 |- style="text-align:center;" | Save % || .597 || Colleen Cahill || 1987-90 |} ==Individual single-season records== {| class="wikitable" |- ! style="width:140px; "|Record ! style="width:35px; "|Amount ! style="width:140px; "|Player ! style="width:50px; "|Year |- style="text- align:center;" | Goals || 71 || Shannon Witzel || 2005 |- style="text- align:center;" | Assists || 43 || Meggie McNamara || 2009 |- style="text- align:center;" | Points || 87 || Ruth Gutridge || 1984 |- style="text- align:center;" | Ground balls || 65 || Robyn Harry || 1998 |- style="text- align:center;" | Draw controls || 107 || Hillary Fratzke || 2006 |- style="text-align:center;" | Caused turnovers || 47 || Hillary Fratzke || 2008 |- style="text-align:center;" | Saves || 360 || Mary Bartel || 1980 |- style="text-align:center;" | Save % || .739 || Mary Bartel || 1979 |} ==Seasons== ==Postseason Results== The Tigers have appeared in 10 NCAA tournaments.
